hanzi-su-wiki:
紡

Значения

Прясть

Мнемоника

Работать с нитками 糸, направляя 方 их как требуется — прясть.

Варианты

纺
purpleculture_pinyin:
fǎng
to spin (cotton or hemp etc); fine woven silk fabric
прядить (хлопок, пенька и т. д.); тонкая тканая шелковая ткань

Pictophonetic: 方 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
紡織 [ fǎng zhī ]: spinning and weaving
紡織品 [ fǎng zhī pǐn ]: textile; fabrics
紡紗 [ fǎng shā ]: to spin (cotton, wool etc); spinning
紡車 [ fǎng chē ]: spinning wheel

heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman can do web spinning in any direction.
heisig_story: For the kanji that means the spinning of thread and other fibers we have the elements: thread . . . compass.
koohiiStory1: Spiderman can spin his webs in any direction.
koohiiStory2: You keep me spinning right round, baby right round, like a compass baby. Spidey is making a retro 80s music video, spinning right round on his giant compass, singing his favourite song.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Move thread in the right direction and you'll end up spinning it into yarn. Then you can spin that yarn into a sweater or a scarf with your favorite half tofu half fugu mascot on it!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine spinning thread into whatever your imagination wants.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While you're spinning you realize that you've always wanted to make your own bowling (ぼう) ball. And bowling ball cover. And bowling ball shoes.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture all of these thread-made bowling items. You're a really big bowling fan, huh?
Ru_Radicals: 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 方 (сторона), 糸 (нить)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the way (方) of the thread (糸) = to make yarn
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spidey can spin his threads in any direction.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸" to " fang " sound. The original meaning is to make silk, hemp, etc. into yarn or thread. "Said Wen": "Spinning, mesh. From Shito, Fang Sheng." "Yu Pian. Itobe: "Spinning, spinning also." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Zhaogong Nineteenth Year": "At the beginning, Ju had a woman, and Juzi killed her husband, and she has become a wife. When he grows old, he entrusts Ji Chan and spins away to save him. When he arrives, he will go abroad." "Widow" is a widow, and " degree " means measuring the height of the city wall. It means that the woman spins according to the height of the city wall and uses it to escape when the army arrives. Another example is "Mozi. Fei Mingxia: "Farmers are negligent in ploughing crops and trees, and women are negligent in spinning and weaving. Then I think the world will not have enough food and clothing."

" Spinning " refers to silk fabrics spun from silk and linen. Such as "Rituals. The Engagement Ceremony: "Bin Hu, welcome the doctor to bribe, and use bundles to spin." Zheng Xuan's note: "Spinning, spinning for it, today is bound (silk) also, so if you hire a monarch, you can make clothes." Jia Gongyan said: "Cloud "Spinning, spinning for it", because of the name this thing is spinning."

" Spinning " also means binding, which is later written as " tie ". "Zhengzitong. "Itobe": "Spinning, binding is also called spinning." Zhu Junsheng "Shuowen Tongxun Dingsheng": "Vulgar characters are tied." Such as "Mandarin. Jinyu Nine": "Xianzi holds (Dong Shu) and spins the Huai in the courtyard." Wei Zhao's note: "Spinning, hanging also." "New Tang Book. "Cool Official Biography": "Or spin the prisoner's beam, with a stone on the head."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸" to " fang " sound. The original meaning is to make silk, hemp, etc. into yarn or thread.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「方」聲。本義是把絲、麻等製成紗或線。《說文》：「紡，網絲也。从糸，方聲。」《玉篇．糸部》：「紡，紡絲也。」如《左傳．昭公十九年》：「初，莒有婦人，莒子殺其夫，已為嫠婦。及老，託於紀鄣，紡焉以度而去之。及師至，則投諸外。」「嫠婦」即寡婦，「度」表示量度城牆的高度。意謂婦人根據城牆的高度紡絲，待軍隊到來之時用以逃跑。又如《墨子．非命下》：「農夫怠乎耕稼樹藝，婦人怠乎紡績織紝，則我以為天下衣食之財將必不足矣。」

　　「紡」引申表示絲、麻等紡製成的絲織品。如《儀禮．聘禮》：「賓禓，迎大夫賄，用束紡。」鄭玄注：「紡，紡絲為之，今之縛（絹）也，所以遣聘君，可以為衣服。」賈公彥疏：「云『紡，紡絲為之』者，因名此物為紡。」

　　「紡」還表示捆綁，後寫作「綁」。《正字通．糸部》：「紡，纏縛亦曰紡。」朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「俗字作綁。」如《國語．晉語九》：「獻子執（董叔）而紡於庭之槐。」韋昭注：「紡，懸也。」《新唐書．酷吏傳》：「或紡囚梁上，縋石於頭。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「方」聲。本義是把絲、麻等製成紗或線。

紡績(ぼうせき): spinning

從「 糸 」，「 方 」聲。本義是把絲、麻等製成紗或線。《說文》：「紡，網絲也。从糸，方聲。」《玉篇．糸部》：「紡，紡絲也。」如《左傳．昭公十九年》：「初，莒有婦人，莒子殺其夫，已為嫠婦。及老，託於紀鄣，紡焉以度而去之。及師至，則投諸外。」「嫠婦」即寡婦，「 度 」表示量度城牆的高度。意謂婦人根據城牆的高度紡絲，待軍隊到來之時用以逃跑。又如《墨子．非命下》：「農夫怠乎耕稼樹藝，婦人怠乎紡績織紝，則我以為天下衣食之財將必不足矣。」 「 紡 」引申表示絲、麻等紡製成的絲織品。如《儀禮．聘禮》：「賓禓，迎大夫賄，用束紡。」鄭玄注：「紡，紡絲為之，今之縛（絹）也，所以遣聘君，可以為衣服。」賈公彥疏：「云『紡，紡絲為之』者，因名此物為紡。」 「 紡 」還表示捆綁，後寫作「 綁 」。《正字通．糸部》：「紡，纏縛亦曰紡。」朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「俗字作綁。」如《國語．晉語九》：「獻子執（董叔）而紡於庭之槐。」韋昭注：「紡，懸也。」《新唐書．酷吏傳》：「或紡囚梁上，縋石於頭。」
From " 糸" to " fang" sound. The original meaning is to make silk, hemp, etc. into yarn or thread. "Said Wen": "Spinning, mesh. From Shito, Fang Sheng." "Yu Pian. Itobe: "Spinning, spinning also." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Zhaogong Nineteenth Year": "At the beginning, Ju had a woman, and Juzi killed her husband, and she has become a wife. When he grows old, he entrusts Ji Chan and spins away to save him. When he arrives, he will go abroad." "Widow" is a widow, and " degree" means measuring the height of the city wall. It means that the woman spins according to the height of the city wall and uses it to escape when the army arrives. Another example is "Mozi. Fei Mingxia: "Farmers are negligent in ploughing crops and trees, and women are negligent in spinning and weaving. Then I think the world will not have enough food and clothing." " Spinning" refers to silk fabrics spun from silk and linen. Such as "Rituals. The Engagement Ceremony: "Bin Hu, welcome the doctor to bribe, and use bundles to spin." Zheng Xuan's note: "Spinning, spinning for it, today is bound (silk) also, so if you hire a monarch, you can make clothes." Jia Gongyan said: "Cloud "Spinning, spinning for it", because of the name this thing is spinning." " Spinning" also means binding, which is later written as " tie". "Zhengzitong. "Itobe": "Spinning, binding is also called spinning." Zhu Junsheng "Shuowen Tongxun Dingsheng": "Vulgar characters are tied." Such as "Mandarin. Jinyu Nine": "Xianzi holds (Dong Shu) and spins the Huai in the courtyard." Wei Zhao's note: "Spinning, hanging also." "New Tang Book. "Cool Official Biography": "Or spin the prisoner's beam, with a stone on the head."

紡字的基本解释

紡
fǎng
见“纺”。

紡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǎng］
［《廣韻》妃兩切，上養，敷。］
“纺1”的繁体字。亦作“鈁2”。
(1)把麻、丝、棉等纺织纤维制成纱或线。
(2)一种稀薄而轻的丝织品。
[②]［bǎng］
“纺2”的繁体字。
悬空绑着；捆缚。

紡字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　紡； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页918第15
【廣韻】【正韻】妃兩切【集韻】【韻會】撫兩切，?音仿。【說文】網絲也。【廣韻】績紡。【急就篇註】謂紡切麻絲之屬爲纑縷也。【儀禮·聘禮】賄用束紡。【註】紡，紡絲爲之，今之縛也。【左傳·昭十九年】託于紀鄣紡焉。【疏】紡，謂紡麻作纑也。　又【晉語】獻子執而紡于庭之槐。【註】紡，縣也。

考證：〔【儀禮·聘禮】賄用吏紡。〕　謹照原文吏紡改束紡。
紡字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

紡字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fǎng］
["Guangyun" concubine cuts in two, raised and applied on top. ]
The traditional characters of "纺1". Also known as "Franium 2".
(1) The hemp, silk, cotton and other textile fibers are made into yarn or thread.
(2) A thin and light silk fabric.
[②]［bǎng］
Traditional Chinese characters for "織2".
Tied up in the air; tied up.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　fang; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 918 15
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Concubine two cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] caress two cuts, imitation of sound. [Said the text] Mesh also. [Guang Yun] Ji spinning. [Jijiupian Note] The genus of spun and cut hemp silk is 纑纑纑也. [Rituals·Borrowing Gifts] Bribery using beam spinning. 【Note】Spinning, spinning for it, now it is bound. [Zuo Zhuan · Zhao Nineteenth Year] Entrusted to Ji Zhan Spinning Yan. 【Sparse】Spin, that is, spun hemp is also used for 纑.　 [Jin dialect] The locust tree which is dedicated to the child and spun in the courtyard. [Note] Spinning, county also. Textual research: [[Ritual Ceremony·Borrowing Gift] Bribery and spinning. 〕 　 I would like to change the spinning from the original to the bundle spinning.

fǎng
вм. 纺
Radicals: 糸, 方  (thread, direction)
Meaning Mnemonic
Move thread in the right direction and you'll end up spinning it into yarn. Then you can spin that yarn into a sweater or a scarf with your favorite half tofu half fugu mascot on it!
Imagine spinning thread into whatever your imagination wants.
Reading Mnemonic
While you're spinning you realize that you've always wanted to make your own bowling (ぼう) ball. And bowling ball cover. And bowling ball shoes.
Picture all of these thread-made bowling items. You're a really big bowling fan, huh?
